mapper.sql: id, parent_id, type, name, href, target, icon, sort, status, permission, create_at, update_at, remarks
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_menu
id,
parent_id,
type,
name,
href,
target,
icon,
sort,
status,
permission,
create_at,
update_at,
remarks,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{parent_id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{type,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{href,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{target,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update sys_menu
parent_id = #{parent_id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
type = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
href = #{href,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
target = #{target,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
permission = #{permission,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_at = #{create_at,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_at = #{update_at,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sys_menu set parent_id = #{parent_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, type = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, href = #{href,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, target = #{target,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, permission = #{permission,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_at = #{create_at,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_at = #{update_at,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT d.* FROM sys_user a INNER JOIN sys_user_role b ON a.id=b.sys_user_id INNER JOIN sys_role_menu c ON c.sys_role_id=b.sys_role_id INNER JOIN sys_menu d ON d.id=c.sys_menu_id WHERE a.id=#{uid}
